ref: 8428 prakaṭá ʻ manifest ʼ Pāṇ. [< prákr̥ta -- ? Cf. prá kr̥ṇōti ʻ brings to light ʼ RV. -- √kr̥1]

lang: Language of `Kharoṣṭhī Inscriptions discovered by Sir Aurel Stein in Chinese Turkestan' edited by A. M. Boyer, E. J. Rapson, and E. Senart
ref: Pk. payaḍa -- , ˚yala -- ʻ published, open ʼ; O
Pk. payaḍa -- , ˚yala -- ʻ published, open ʼ; O
G. payaḍu ʻ famous, well known ʼ;
Si. pahaḷa, pāḷa ʻ clear, open, wellknown ʼ, paḷa karanavā ʻ to publish ʼ.
